_source.text: 3. Raymond Tiangco - My Legs Look Better Than Yours - Philippines / 37 Points (ONCE-Eroski 25, Cofidis 7, Bonus Points 5)

text: 3. Raymond Tiangco - My Legs Look **Better** **Than** Yours - Philippines / 37 Points (**ONCE**-Eroski 25, **Cofidis** 7, Bonus Points 5)

_source.text: After all, if you want someone to lead a relegated club straight back to the Premier League, who better than someone who has already done it once - and, better still, with a minimum of fuss and no big spending?

text: **better** **than** someone who has already done it **once** - and, better still, with a minimum of fuss and no big spending?
